name: Wirabbit
description:
The Power Plant Has Come Unplugged!

The massive electricity-generating tree that powers the entire city long ago outgrew the original power plant that contained it. When a blackout suddenly hits, and no other issues can be found in the grid, someone is going to have to go climb the power plant and repair the connections. Today that someone is 

Fuse the Rabbit! Puzzle Grappling Hook Action!

With Fuse's wire hook you can grab onto hook points, platforms, and soft surfaces to navigate the old power facility. You can even grab and throw things too! Get to the top of the power plant and restore power to the city!

How To Play: Control Bindings:

Z - A button

X - B button

Arrow Keys - Dpad

Actions:

Left and Right Dpad - Run

A button - Jump/Cancel hook

Any Dpad direction - Aim your hook

B button (tap) - Grapple to something

B button (hold) - Pull something to you

Dpad up - Enter doors

Dpad down and A button - Drop through thin platforms

Special Tips:
  • You can jump your way out halfway through reeling in your hook for some extra height or better control.
  • You can hook downwards through thin platforms to grab something below.
  • Grappling into a wall gives you a nice bounce to gain some height.
  • Stuck? Push switches and place glowing power cells into their sockets to open the way.
  • Good Luck!
